material.mattext: What is the primary goal of Radio Resource Management (RRM)?
Which of the following is a common RRM strategy?
What does RRM ensure in a wireless network?
Optimal use of available radio spectrum
What is the main function of Packet Scheduling in telecommunication systems?
Efficient distribution of data packets to users
Which algorithm is commonly used for packet scheduling in LTE networks?
What is the purpose of the Proportional Fair (PF) scheduling algorithm?
Balance throughput and fairness among users
What does QoS stand for in the context of RRM and packet scheduling?
Which of the following is a key parameter in QoS for packet scheduling?
What is the function of a scheduler in packet-switched networks?
Which packet scheduling algorithm aims to maximize system throughput?
What does the term 'fairness' refer to in packet scheduling?
Equal opportunity for all users to access network resources
In LTE, what does the term 'resource block' refer to?
A unit of resource allocation for data transmission
Which scheduling technique is used to prioritize real-time data?
What does the term 'latency' mean in telecommunications?
How does dynamic frequency selection contribute to RRM?
By adapting frequency use based on current network conditions
What is the main benefit of using adaptive modulation in RRM?
What does the term 'throughput' refer to in packet scheduling?
Amount of data successfully transmitted over a network
Which of the following is an example of a channel quality indicator (CQI)?
How does packet scheduling affect user experience in mobile networks?
By determining the efficiency and fairness of data distribution
Which packet scheduling algorithm is known for minimizing latency?
What is the role of an admission control mechanism in RRM?
Determining whether new traffic can be accommodated
How does inter-cell interference coordination (ICIC) improve RRM?
By reducing interference between neighboring cells
What is the purpose of a scheduling metric in packet scheduling?
Evaluating the priority of data transmissions
In which scenario is frequency reuse an important aspect of RRM?
What does the term 'bandwidth efficiency' refer to in telecommunications?
Effective use of bandwidth to maximize data transmission
Which component in LTE networks is responsible for RRM functions?
What is the function of a priority queue in packet scheduling?
Managing data packets based on their priority level
How does power control contribute to effective RRM?
Adjusting the transmission power of signals to optimize network performance
What is the main advantage of using time division multiplexing (TDM) in packet scheduling?
Allocating time slots for efficient data transmission
Which term describes the delay experienced by a data packet in a network?
